reviewText: Quite a composition of their work pieced together for your enjoyment!!! Was very entertaining & enjoyed it a lot, recommend it to everyone interested in Laurel & Hardy!! Two of their movies is on the other tape, The Flying Deuces & Utopia!! It says that the movies are 50 minutes long & the anthology one is 45 minutes long, but on the cover it says 93 minutes of fun! The movies are shortened from there original length!!!
